page.title: 16MEDIA & COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: In the 12 square km that we are covering there are a number of news papers.The main one is the{Chester {Chronicle}that covers our 12 square km and more. It mentions local events such as cubs,scouts,brownies and local fetes etc.It also tells you the local news that is going on.There are other local papers such as the{Kingsley {News}that comes once a month.There are also magazines such as{Cheshire Life etc.There are 8 post boxes in the 12 square km most of them are in Kingsley. Most people have a{telephone in their homes.
